price: 52. Waxaana uga dhawaaqnay dhinaca Buurta ee midigta ah8, oo soo dhoweynay innagoo la faqeyna.
arabic: وَنَٰدَيۡنَٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّبۡنَٰهُ نَجِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wanādaynāhu min jānibi al-ṭūri al-aymani waqarrabnāhu najiyyan
